means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 沃克曼显然是职业名称，劳动者，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“劳动+人”(work+man)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"工人，劳动者"之意。
means: worker ： 最常用词，泛指一切从事体力或脑力劳动以谋生的人。
workman ： 指雇佣工作，尤指有特种技能的工人。
labourer ： 多指体力劳动者，尤指无专长或专门技能的工人。

sentence.Network_en: Hundreds of flies buzz around us, and the workman keeps swatting them.
sentence.Network_cn: 数百只苍蝇围着我们转，工作人员不停地拍打。

sentence.Network_en: Millson saw the workman, Terry, descending the ladder.
sentence.Network_cn: 米尔森看见工人特里正从梯子上下来。

sentence.Network_en: A bad workman finds much fault with his tools.
sentence.Network_cn: 蹩脚的工匠总是埋怨自己的工具不好.

phrase.cizu_name: a bad workman always blames his tools

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)a person who has done something badly will seek to lay the blame on their equipment rather than admit their own lack of skill
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)自己笨，怪刀钝（或： 拙匠总怪工具差）

entry.tran: (建造、维修房屋等的)工匠，工人
entry.def: A workman is a man who works with his hands, for example building or repairing houses or roads.

example.ex: In University Square workmen are building a steel fence...
example.tran: 在大学广场上，工人们正在修建钢栅栏。

example.ex: Millson saw the workman, Terry, descending the ladder.
example.tran: 米尔森看见工人特里正从梯子上下来。

means.word_mean: 1. an employee who performs manual or industrial labor
